title: Siuqila too good, to be true : omen : though so at a vewe yet all I tolde you is true, I vpholde you, now cease to aske why? for I can not lye : herein is shewed by way of dialogue, the wonderful maners of the people of Mauqsun, with other talke not friuolous.
author: Lupton, Thomas.
publisher: By H. Bynneman, dwelling in Thames Streate, neere vnto Baynards Castell,
